tickets.title: Login Issues - Can't Access Account
tickets.description: Customer is unable to log in to their account. They've tried resetting their password multiple times but still can't access their account.

tickets.title: Payment Failed - Card Declined
tickets.description: Customer attempted to pay using Visa ending 1234 but the payment keeps failing despite sufficient balance.

tickets.title: Unable to Download Invoice
tickets.description: Customer cannot download their January invoice from the billing section. The download button is not responding when clicked.

tickets.title: Incorrect Billing Address
tickets.description: Customer's billing address shows a different city. They updated it but it still displays the old one in their profile.

tickets.title: App Crash on Launch
tickets.description: Customer reports that the mobile app crashes immediately upon opening on Android 13. Unable to access any features.

tickets.title: Refund Not Processed
tickets.description: Customer requested a refund two weeks ago but has not received the amount yet. Order #RF2024-001 still shows as pending.

tickets.title: Two-Factor Authentication Issue
tickets.description: Customer is not receiving 2FA codes on their registered phone number. They cannot complete the login process.

tickets.title: Unable to Update Profile Picture
tickets.description: Customer tries to upload a new profile picture but gets 'Upload failed' error. Tried multiple image formats without success.

tickets.title: Subscription Auto-Renewal
tickets.description: Customer wants to enable auto-renewal for their subscription but the toggle switch is disabled and cannot be activated.

tickets.title: Missing Order Confirmation Email
tickets.description: Customer placed an order but didn't receive a confirmation email even though payment succeeded. Order shows in account.

tickets.title: Feature Request - Dark Mode
tickets.description: Customer is requesting a dark mode option for the web application as the current bright theme strains their eyes during night usage.

tickets.title: Export Data Not Working
tickets.description: Customer cannot export their data from the dashboard. The export button generates an empty CSV file instead of their actual data.

tickets.title: Slow Page Load Times
tickets.description: Customer reports extremely slow page load times, especially on the dashboard. Takes over 30 seconds to load basic information.

tickets.title: Notification Settings Not Saving
tickets.description: Customer changes their notification preferences but the settings revert to default after page refresh. Changes are not being saved.
